thread.title: Djokovic Advances to Semifinals
thread.title_full: Djokovic Advances to Semifinals - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Djokovic Advances to Semifinals
text:
Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 27 matches at the China Open in Beijing with a 6-2, 6-2 win over John Isner in a quarterfinal.
